text: My email is <mailto:caitlinp2005@icloud.com|caitlinp2005@icloud.com> I really appreciate for your help

Sorry, I clicked return before changing my sentence! I really appreciate your help with making contact with the London department. My Mum has told me about the Next Gen apprenticeship as it came up on twitter as she follows them and Access VFX - I will make sure to follow them as well to keep myself updated. The apprenticeship looks amazing but unfortunately I have another year of education In senior school. So I will look at applying next year, if I decide that I would prefer this over a HR role.

I am away with my school for a few days in July so I am thinking a placement in my school holidays (August) might be a better option, as I can do 1-2 full weeks. It will be great to start making some contacts and see if they would give me an opportunity.

I sent the email to you and Karen, the London HR advisor, and indication on what to send her way and maybe a little description of what you’re intend is (to get a first intro to both HR and VFX careers as you’re hesitant between which route pursuing is my understanding). I don’t know if that’s an option where you live but when I was 14, in my school program, we had to do a minimum of 40h per year volunteering with organizations. I found it great to have that on my CV when I started to apply at part time jobs at 15 and later to build my experience. I volunteered in a spring break camp with children.
It helped building work experience and develop skills that are transferable like organization, and even managing in a way.
